name: Funfair Ride Simulator: Spin-around
description:
ATTENTION: The new "Funfair Ride Simulator 2" is here! There you can add "Spin-around" via InApp with cool new features. Search for "FUNFAIR RIDE SIMULATOR 2"!

Did you ever control your own funfair ride? Now with Funfair Ride Simulator it is possible! In the first episode you can control one unique ride on your iPhone and iPod touch!

Funfair Ride Simulator is the first and only funfair ride simulation for your iPhone and iPod touch!

FEATURES:
- Realistic movement and physics
- Control your own funfair ride
- Unique fairground / carnival athmosphere

++ Also take a look at our other simulations ++
